title: DELIGHTFULLY FUNNY
review: One of the best musicals ever! The Sound of Music is a light, funny, family-oriented love story. A must see for all!

title: WASTE OF MONEY!
review: This is the most ridiculous, off the wall, idiotic 'movie' I've ever seen. Words cannot describe this total flop!

title: WORTH WATCHING!
review: A little on the silly side but definitely funny and 'human'.  A must see for the family!
